name: USB-C Cable 2m
description: High-quality braided USB-C to USB-C cable, 2 meters long. Supports fast charging up to 100W and data transfer speeds up to 10Gbps. Durable aluminum connectors with reinforced strain relief.

reviews.author: TechEnthusiast42
reviews.text: Excellent cable! Fast charging works perfectly with my laptop and phone. The braided design feels very premium.

reviews.author: CableCollector
reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Slightly stiff at first but loosened up after a few days of use.

name: HDMI 2.1 Cable 3m
description: Ultra high-speed HDMI 2.1 cable, 3 meters. Supports 8K@60Hz and 4K@120Hz with eARC and VRR. Gold-plated connectors for reliable signal transmission.

reviews.author: HomeTheaterPro
reviews.text: Finally a cable that actually supports full HDMI 2.1 bandwidth. 4K@120Hz works flawlessly with my PS5 and LG OLED.

name: USB-C Charger 65W
description: Compact GaN USB-C charger with 65W Power Delivery. Compatible with laptops, tablets, and smartphones. Foldable prongs for easy travel. Includes EU plug.

name: USB-C Hub 7-Port
description: Versatile USB-C hub with 7 ports: 3x USB-A 3.0, 1x USB-C PD 100W passthrough, 1x HDMI 4K@60Hz, 1x SD card reader, 1x microSD card reader. Aluminum housing with thermal management.

reviews.author: DigitalNomad
reviews.text: Great hub for the price. All ports work simultaneously without issues. The PD passthrough charges my MacBook at full speed.

reviews.author: OfficeWorker99
reviews.text: Replaced my docking station with this. Perfect for hot-desking. Compact enough to carry in my laptop bag every day.

name: Aluminum Laptop Stand
description: Ergonomic aluminum laptop stand with adjustable height and angle. Fits laptops from 10" to 17". Improves airflow and reduces neck strain. Non-slip silicone pads protect your device.

name: 27" 4K Monitor
description: Professional 27-inch 4K UHD IPS monitor with 99% sRGB color accuracy. USB-C connectivity with 90W Power Delivery. Height-adjustable stand with pivot, swivel, and tilt. Built-in KVM switch.

reviews.author: DesignerDave
reviews.text: Stunning color accuracy out of the box. The USB-C single-cable setup with my MacBook Pro is a dream. Best monitor in this price range.
